CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aegis Corp relative to Apex Systems?
SRP.A: Aegis Corp is {above} Apex Systems in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aegis Corp relative to Starlight Innovations?
SRP.A: Aegis Corp is {below} Starlight Innovations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Apex Systems relative to Aegis Corp?
SRP.A: Apex Systems is {below} Aegis Corp in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total market share?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aegis Corp}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total market share?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Apex Systems}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starlight Innovations's minimum Market Share in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starlight Innovations's minimum Market Share is in {1981}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starlight Innovations's maximum Market Share in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starlight Innovations's maximum Market Share is in {1966}.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1972, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1968 and 1972 was {smaller} than between 1982 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1982, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1986 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1967 and 1982 was {larger} than between 1986 and 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1986, was the average total Market Share higher or lower than between 1969 and 1970?
NC.A: The average total market share between 1985 and 1986 was {lower} than between 1969 and 1970.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1985, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1981 and 1984?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1976 and 1985 was {larger} than between 1981 and 1984.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aegis Corp} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Apex Systems and Starlight Innovations first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Apex Systems and Starlight Innovations first exchanged leading positions in {1967}.
